name: Stalker (V)
Lore: 'Originally assigned to search the Outer Rim for new worlds to subjugate. Launched the probe droid that found Echo Base. Later reassigned to Death Squadron.',
Text: 'May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles and 4 TIEs. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. During your deploy phase, may deploy one [Hoth] Probe Droid to a related site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
